Text: FW First Call Associates Executive Recruiters in EnergyOriginal Message From Adrian Clark mailto Sent Tuesday November PM To Subject First Call Associates Executive Recruiters in Energy Tom I am the executive recruiter you spoke to today about your trading background Thanks very much for your time As discussed Ive attached my contact information for your records and a couple of resume examples to help in constructing yours You can find more information about my firm at wwwfirstcallassociatescom We are very familiar with the nuances of the energy trading business and have built relationships with many energy companies in North America enabling us to present qualified employees for their consideration Please send your resume back to me so we can talk further about your background and interests in new opportunities Adrian Clark Director First Call Associates Inc Andrew Dr Canton CT fax Inline attachment follows From To Date Monday October GMT Subject Executive recruiter in the energy and telecommunications industries
